mapper.select: SELECT * FROM T2_STAY_TBL S INNER JOIN T2_CODE_TYPE C ON S.STAY_KIND = C.C_KIND LEFT JOIN T2_ROOM_TBL R ON R.STAY_NO = S.STAY_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) ROOM_CNT, PRODUCT_NO, STATE FROM T2_PACKAGE_REQUEST_TBL WHERE PRODUCT_KIND = 'STAY' GROUP BY PRODUCT_NO ) P ON P.PRODUCT_NO = R.ROOM_NO WHERE ROOM_DELYN = 'N' AND U_ID = #{uId} AND S.STAY_NO = #{stayNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T2_ROOM_TBL (STAY_NO, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_PRICE, ROOM_SALES, PEOPLE_MAX, ROOM_INSERT_TIME, ROOM_UPDATE_TIME, ROOM_RESIDUE, ROOM_DELYN) VALUES (#{stayNo}, #{roomName}, #{roomPrice}, 1, #{peopleMax}, NOW(), NOW(), 1, 'N')
mapper.update: UPDATE T2_ROOM_TBL SET ROOM_NAME = #{roomName}, ROOM_PRICE = #{roomPrice}, PEOPLE_MAX = #{peopleMax}, ROOM_RESIDUE = #{roomResidue}, ROOM_SALES = #{roomSales} WHERE ROOM_NO = #{roomNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM T2_PACKAGE_REQUEST_TBL WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{roomNo} AND PRODUCT_KIND = 'STAY'
